channel.title: Project-Unlimited -Being made still!-
channel.description:
Im still coding but here's some screenies =]
K well when i first started on this source etc, i noticed there was no way for begginers to make cash.
So i added this npc when u talk to him he gives u 1m per time. Here's what he says..
Hans:
[IMG]http://i264.photobucket.com/albums/ii181/woodcuttersam/hans.jpg[/img]
Yeah. then i noticed its kinda hard to get food. So this npc gives u 1m sharks everytime u talk to him, here's what he says.
[IMG]http://i264.photobucket.com/albums/ii181/woodcuttersam/Charlie.jpg[/img]
And yeh he gives 1m sharks. every time u click him.
Heres the home starting area/shops:
[IMG]http://i264.photobucket.com/albums/ii181/woodcuttersam/home.jpg[/img]
There's alot more but i wouldn't like to show the whole server till people play it. i will not advertise the server either, because i will make a youtube video for that.
Here's a pic of the client i made for it aswell.
[IMG]http://i264.photobucket.com/albums/ii181/woodcuttersam/clientpic.jpg[/img]
When it gets better more pics will be released! utube video comming out soon to advertise the server!
**EDIT**Request to change the "_" on npc names has been changed.

item.title: Project-Unlimited -Being made still!-
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

primadude:

‘Being made still!’ - Surely if the server is being posted in the Development section, the server must still be worked on?

spmmar

@Topic: Change the client background, please, and good luck.

item.title: Project-Unlimited -Being made still!-
item.dc:creator: @Skillapwnz Skillapwnz
item.description:
@Skillapwnz wrote:

kk i will work on most of these ty ;D

i changed the _ things on the npcs, and the reason i made excessive amounts of cash, there is no other moneymaking way in the server besides this, + u cant click very often maybe once every 15 clicks or so lets say if u clicked constantly u only actually get the 1m every 10-15 clicks.

Read full topic

item.title: Project-Unlimited -Being made still!-
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Just a few things:

  1. Why are you making excessive amounts of cash s accessible(talk to hands, addItem(995, 1000000)
  2. Small thing: One thing that most servers have is when an Npc has a space in their name/title, it shows up as an '’. Quick fix is before the Npc name is written to the frame, replace all the ''s with a " ".
  3. I would suggest changing the background of the client.

Read full topic
